item.title: 5-Line Cover Letter Framework ✍️ • Start with a strong opening line. • Mention one specific skill or achievement. • Connect your skill to the job role. • Include a brief call to action. • Close with gratitude and your name. How can you tailor your cover letter to stand out in just 5 lines? #coverletter #jobsearch #ScalePilot #SocialPilot #AIAutomations
